short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for AI-assisted writing improvement

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your online writing instantly with WriteSharp, an intelligent Chrome extension that leverages advanced AI to improve the clarity and professionalism of your text.

What WriteSharp does:
- Refines selected text on supported webpages, making it clearer and more professional.
- Provides side-by-side comparison of original and improved text.
- Allows for easy editing and one-click insertion of refined text.
- Supports custom prompts for tailored text improvements.

Why you should install WriteSharp:
- Save time on editing and proofreading.
- Improve the quality of your emails, social media posts, and online content.
- Enhance your professional communication skills.
- Customize the AI to suit your specific writing needs.
- Maintain privacy with local text processing and secure API key management.

Perfect for:
- Professionals crafting important emails or reports
- Students working on online assignments
- Content creators aiming to polish their writing
- Non-native English speakers looking to refine their language
- Anyone who wants to communicate more effectively online

WriteSharp seamlessly integrates with your browsing experience, offering instant improvements to your writing with just a few clicks. It's like having a professional editor and writing coach right in your browser!

Note: Note: WriteSharp requires an OpenAI API key (not included). It works on many popular email and social media platforms. However, it is not compatible with complex web applications such as Google Docs, Microsoft Office Online or Google Sheets due to their unique document structures.

Upgrade your online writing today with WriteSharp â€“ Your path to clearer, more impactful communication!
